name: Ice Cream Mix-Up
description:
I scream! You scream! We all scream for...what were we screaming about again??

Help the world's most forgetful ice cream man deliver ice cream in this memory puzzle game.

Click and drag ice cream flavors into the cart. However, the Ice Cream Man forgets which color is which, and the ice cream will get jumbled up! Try to click, drag, and drop off ice cream correctly to the customers that appear (they really are a handful!).

Submission for Global Game Jam 2021.

Created by the Isolation Bros.

>Emilio Arias- Coder/Pun Master

>Josh Marshall- Coder/Certified Josh Professional

>Theo Kurokawa- Artist/Blue Moon Ice Cream Enthusiast
